entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:57 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:57 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
